'''Astar''' (sg. ''asta''<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 120</ref>) is [[Quenya]] for the ''months'' of the [[Númenórean]] calendars. 

Typically, an ''asta'' had 30 days, with the exception of the [[Nárië|two]] [[Cermie|medial]] ''astar'' in the [[Kings' Reckoning]], that had 31 days each.<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''asta'' derives from the [[Sundocarmë|Root]] SAT.<ref>{{VT|42a}}, pp. 19-20</ref><ref>{{VT|48a}}, p. 11</ref>
